channel.title: Getting items
channel.description: Ok i dont know if this is normal but there is no items on here, does anyone know how to get them? Like armor and weapons?

item.title: Getting items
item.dc:creator: @im_hard im hard
item.description:
@im_hard wrote:

type ::pickup itemnumber amount exsame ::pickup 0995 (cash) 1000 (1000gp 1k)

Read full topic

item.title: Getting items
item.dc:creator: @hax3dup hax3dup
item.description:
@hax3dup wrote:

Or you can make a command, do that by searching in client.java for

/*END OF FRAME TESTING*/

Directly under it put this:

else if (command.equalsIgnoreCase("NAME OF COMMAND HERE") && playerRights >= 0) { addItem(ITEM ID HERE, ITEM AMOUND HERE ); }

Change playerRights >= 0) to the player rights you want,
0=normal players
1=moderators
2=admins
3=owner

Or you can do one of these:
::pickup 1050 1 ( for one santa hat )
::item 1050 ( for one santa hat)

Read full topic

item.title: Getting items
item.dc:creator: @i_am_an_elf i am an elf
item.description:
@i_am_an_elf wrote:

umm type ::(itemid) like ::item 1044 would be green p hat. or type ::pickup 1045 (noted green p hat) 5000. For 5000 noted green p hats

Read full topic
